name: Mò The Frog
description: Mo the frog is a classic 2D platform in which you will have to committ fully to ho through many levels that are present in the game. Dress the part of Mò the frog in the epic adventure to free Avalaar's kingdom from the oppression which the terrible Peter's the troll and his henchmen, the black captains, try to bring by conquering it.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: AMD FX 4300 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Ati Radeon HD 5450 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
